Name: Acrobatic Spellcaster
Description: Avoid attacks of opportunity from casting with Acrobatics

Name: Adder Strike
Description: May apply contact poison to unarmed strikes

Name: Advanced Armor Training
Prerequisite: Armor training class feature, fighter level 3rd.
Description: Gain an advanced armor training option

Name: Advanced Defensive Combat Training
Prerequisite: Agile Maneuvers, Bellflower Network 10 TPA, Aerial Roll
Description: Gain a +4 bonus to your CMD

Name: Advanced Weapon Training
Prerequisite: Fighter level 5th, weapon training class feature
Description: Gain an advanced weapon training option

Name: Aerial Roll
Description: Dodge attacks by making with a Fly check

Name: Agile Maiden
Prerequisite: Str 13; Dex 13; Endurance or armor training class feature; proficiency with heavy armor
Description: Treat Gray Maiden plate as medium or heavy armor for class features

Name: Agile Maneuvers
Description: Use your Dex bonus when calculating your CMB

Name: Alchemical Strike
Description: Increase the save DC of thrown alchemical items

Name: Aldori Artistry
Prerequisite: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (Aldori dueling sword), Weapon Finesse, base attack bonus +2, Aerial Roll
Description: Gain a+2 bonus on a combat maneuver when using an Aldori dueling sword
